message: puppeteer: Up and running with a persistent connection!
filesystem: Up and running with a persistent connection!
excel: Up and running with a persistent connection!

tools.name: read_file
tools.description: Read the complete contents of a file from the file system. Handles various text encodings and provides detailed error messages if the file cannot be read. Use this tool when you need to examine the contents of a single file. Only works within allowed directories.

tools.name: read_multiple_files
tools.description: Read the contents of multiple files simultaneously. This is more efficient than reading files one by one when you need to analyze or compare multiple files. Each file's content is returned with its path as a reference. Failed reads for individual files won't stop the entire operation. Only works within allowed directories.

tools.name: write_file
tools.description: Create a new file or completely overwrite an existing file with new content. Use with caution as it will overwrite existing files without warning. Handles text content with proper encoding. Only works within allowed directories.

tools.name: edit_file
tools.description: Make line-based edits to a text file. Each edit replaces exact line sequences with new content. Returns a git-style diff showing the changes made. Only works within allowed directories.

oldText.description: Text to search for - must match exactly

dryRun.description: Preview changes using git-style diff format

tools.name: create_directory
tools.description: Create a new directory or ensure a directory exists. Can create multiple nested directories in one operation. If the directory already exists, this operation will succeed silently. Perfect for setting up directory structures for projects or ensuring required paths exist. Only works within allowed directories.

tools.name: list_directory
tools.description: Get a detailed listing of all files and directories in a specified path. Results clearly distinguish between files and directories with [FILE] and [DIR] prefixes. This tool is essential for understanding directory structure and finding specific files within a directory. Only works within allowed directories.

tools.name: directory_tree
tools.description: Get a recursive tree view of files and directories as a JSON structure. Each entry includes 'name', 'type' (file/directory), and 'children' for directories. Files have no children array, while directories always have a children array (which may be empty). The output is formatted with 2-space indentation for readability. Only works within allowed directories.

tools.name: move_file
tools.description: Move or rename files and directories. Can move files between directories and rename them in a single operation. If the destination exists, the operation will fail. Works across different directories and can be used for simple renaming within the same directory. Both source and destination must be within allowed directories.

tools.name: search_files
tools.description: Recursively search for files and directories matching a pattern. Searches through all subdirectories from the starting path. The search is case-insensitive and matches partial names. Returns full paths to all matching items. Great for finding files when you don't know their exact location. Only searches within allowed directories.

tools.name: get_file_info
tools.description: Retrieve detailed metadata about a file or directory. Returns comprehensive information including size, creation time, last modified time, permissions, and type. This tool is perfect for understanding file characteristics without reading the actual content. Only works within allowed directories.

tools.name: list_allowed_directories
tools.description: Returns the list of directories that this server is allowed to access. Use this to understand which directories are available before trying to access files.

tools.name: excel_copy_sheet
tools.description: Copy existing sheet to a new sheet

fileAbsolutePath.description: Absolute path to the Excel file

srcSheetName.description: Source sheet name in the Excel file

tools.name: excel_create_table
tools.description: Create a table in the Excel sheet

fileAbsolutePath.description: Absolute path to the Excel file

sheetName.description: Sheet name where the table is created

tools.name: excel_describe_sheets
tools.description: List all sheet information of specified Excel file

fileAbsolutePath.description: Absolute path to the Excel file

tools.name: excel_read_sheet
tools.description: Read values from Excel sheet with pagination.

fileAbsolutePath.description: Absolute path to the Excel file

knownPagingRanges.description: List of already read paging ranges

range.description: Range of cells to read in the Excel sheet (e.g., "A1:C10"). [default: first paging range]

sheetName.description: Sheet name in the Excel file

tools.name: excel_screen_capture
tools.description: [Windows only] Take a screenshot of the Excel sheet with pagination.

fileAbsolutePath.description: Absolute path to the Excel file

knownPagingRanges.description: List of already read paging ranges

range.description: Range of cells to read in the Excel sheet (e.g., "A1:C10"). [default: first paging range]

sheetName.description: Sheet name in the Excel file

tools.name: excel_write_to_sheet
tools.description: Write values to the Excel sheet

fileAbsolutePath.description: Absolute path to the Excel file

newSheet.description: Create a new sheet if true, otherwise write to the existing sheet

range.description: Range of cells in the Excel sheet (e.g., "A1:C10")

sheetName.description: Sheet name in the Excel file

values.description: Values to write to the Excel sheet. If the value is a formula, it should start with "="

tools.name: puppeteer_navigate
tools.description: Navigate to a URL

launchOptions.description: PuppeteerJS LaunchOptions. Default null. If changed and not null, browser restarts. Example: { headless: true, args: ['--no-sandbox'] }

allowDangerous.description: Allow dangerous LaunchOptions that reduce security. When false, dangerous args like --no-sandbox will throw errors. Default false.

tools.name: puppeteer_screenshot
tools.description: Take a screenshot of the current page or a specific element

selector.description: CSS selector for element to screenshot

encoded.description: If true, capture the screenshot as a base64-encoded data URI (as text) instead of binary image content. Default false.

tools.name: puppeteer_click
tools.description: Click an element on the page

selector.description: CSS selector for element to click

tools.name: puppeteer_fill
tools.description: Fill out an input field

tools.name: puppeteer_select
tools.description: Select an element on the page with Select tag

selector.description: CSS selector for element to select

tools.name: puppeteer_hover
tools.description: Hover an element on the page

selector.description: CSS selector for element to hover

tools.name: puppeteer_evaluate
tools.description: Execute JavaScript in the browser console

tools.name: __human_input__
tools.description:
Request input from a human user. Pauses the workflow until input is received.

Args:
    request: The human input request

Returns:
    The input provided by the human

Raises:
    TimeoutError: If the timeout is exceeded

request.description: Represents a request for human input.

{"path":"C:\Users\Ayush Singh\Desktop\Mcp Claude\Test_Implementation_Documentation.txt","content":"Test Implementation Documentation
=============================

Date: 2024-06-XX
Environment:
- Application under test: Sauce Demo (https://www.saucedemo.com)
- Browser: Chromium (via Puppeteer)
- Test Data Source: Book2.xlsx (sheet: Book2)

Summary:
--------
Implemented automated tests for the following scenarios defined in Book2.xlsx:
1. TC_INV_001 – Verify product names and images on inventory page.
2. TC_INV_002 – Verify sorting functionality (Name A–Z, Z–A, Price low–high, high–low).

Setup & Login:
---------------
1. Navigate to https://www.saucedemo.com/
2. Enter credentials:
   - Username: standard_user
   - Password: secret_sauce
3. Click "Login" and verify landing on the inventory page.

Test Steps & Implementation:
---------------------------
TC_INV_001:
- Locate all elements with class `.inventory_item`.
- For each item, verify presence of `.inventory_item_name` text and an image under `.inventory_item_img img`.
- Confirm that names are non-empty and image `src` attributes are valid URLs.

TC_INV_002:
- Identify the sorting dropdown with class `.product_sort_container`.
- For each sort option:
  * Set dropdown value:
    - `az` → "Name (A to Z)"
    - `za` → "Name (Z to A)"
    - `lohi` → "Price (low to high)"
    - `hilo` → "Price (high to low)"
  * Dispatch change event
  * Collect current item names or prices
  * Compare order against expected sorted sequences

Results:
--------
Test Case | Result | Comments
--------- | ------ | --------
TC_INV_001 | PASS | All product names and images displayed correctly.
TC_INV_002 | FAIL | Only "Name (A to Z)" sorting passed; other options did not reorder correctly.

Test Output Storage:
--------------------
Results were written back to Book2.xlsx in sheet `Automated_Results` under cells A2:C3.

Conclusion:
-----------
- Inventory display functionality is verified as working.
- Sorting functionality has defects for reverse and price-based options; further investigation required.

Author: Automated Test Suite

content.text:
Read Sheet

ABCDEF
1Test Case IDTest Case NameTest CategoryTest StepsExpected OutcomePriority
2TC_PL_001Verify Product Listing Page LoadFunctional1. Navigate to https://www.saucedemo.com
2. Login with valid credentials
3. Verify page loads completely
4. Check for page title 'Swag Labs'		Product listing page loads successfully with all products displayed and page title shows 'Swag Labs'High
3TC_PL_002Verify Product Grid DisplayUI/Layout1. Login and navigate to inventory page
2. Verify products are displayed in grid format
3. Check each product has image, name, description, and price
4. Verify 'Add to cart' button is present for each product		All products displayed in proper grid layout with complete information and functional buttonsHigh
4TC_PL_003Verify Product Sorting - Name A to ZFunctional1. Access product listing page
2. Click on sorting dropdown
3. Select 'Name (A to Z)' option
4. Verify products are sorted alphabetically		Products are sorted in ascending alphabetical order by nameMedium
5TC_PL_004Verify Product Sorting - Name Z to AFunctional1. Access product listing page
2. Click on sorting dropdown
3. Select 'Name (Z to A)' option
4. Verify products are sorted reverse alphabetically		Products are sorted in descending alphabetical order by nameMedium
6TC_PL_005Verify Product Sorting - Price Low to HighFunctional1. Access product listing page
2. Click on sorting dropdown
3. Select 'Price (low to high)' option
4. Verify products are sorted by price ascending		Products are sorted by price from lowest to highestMedium
7TC_PL_006Verify Product Sorting - Price High to LowFunctional1. Access product listing page
2. Click on sorting dropdown
3. Select 'Price (high to low)' option
4. Verify products are sorted by price descending		Products are sorted by price from highest to lowestMedium
8TC_PL_007Verify Add to Cart FunctionalityFunctional1. Navigate to product listing page
2. Click 'Add to cart' button for any product
3. Verify button text changes to 'Remove'
4. Check cart badge shows item count		Product is added to cart, button text changes, and cart counter incrementsHigh
9TC_PL_008Verify Remove from Cart FunctionalityFunctional1. Add a product to cart first
2. Click 'Remove' button for the same product
3. Verify button text changes back to 'Add to cart'
4. Check cart badge decrements		Product is removed from cart, button text reverts, and cart counter decrementsHigh
10TC_PL_009Verify Product Image DisplayUI/Visual1. Access product listing page
2. Verify all product images are loaded
3. Check images are properly sized and aligned
4. Verify no broken image icons		All product images display correctly without any broken linksMedium
11TC_PL_010Verify Product Name LinksNavigation1. Navigate to product listing page
2. Click on any product name
3. Verify navigation to product detail page
4. Check product details match selected item		Clicking product name navigates to correct product detail pageMedium
12TC_PL_011Verify Product Image LinksNavigation1. Navigate to product listing page
2. Click on any product image
3. Verify navigation to product detail page
4. Check product details match selected item		Clicking product image navigates to correct product detail pageMedium
13TC_PL_012Verify Multiple Items Add to CartFunctional1. Navigate to product listing page
2. Add multiple different products to cart
3. Verify cart counter shows correct total
4. Check all items in cart		Multiple items can be added and cart counter reflects accurate countHigh
14TC_PL_013Verify Price Format DisplayUI/Data1. Access product listing page
2. Check price format for all products
3. Verify currency symbol ($) is displayed
4. Check decimal places are consistent		All prices display with proper currency formatting ($X.XX)Low
15TC_PL_014Verify Product Description TextContent1. Navigate to product listing page
2. Check product descriptions are visible
3. Verify descriptions are complete and readable
4. Check for any truncation or formatting issues		Product descriptions are clearly visible and properly formattedLow
16TC_PL_015Verify Page Responsiveness - Mobile ViewResponsive1. Open product listing page
2. Resize browser to mobile width (375px)
3. Verify layout adjusts properly
4. Check all elements remain accessible		Page layout adapts correctly to mobile screen sizeMedium
17TC_PL_016Verify Page Responsiveness - Tablet ViewResponsive1. Open product listing page
2. Resize browser to tablet width (768px)
3. Verify layout adjusts properly
4. Check grid arrangement changes appropriately		Page layout adapts correctly to tablet screen sizeMedium
18TC_PL_017Verify Shopping Cart Icon FunctionalityNavigation1. Navigate to product listing page
2. Click on shopping cart icon
3. Verify navigation to cart page
4. Check cart contents display correctly		Cart icon navigates to cart page showing current itemsMedium
19TC_PL_018Verify Menu/Navigation BarNavigation1. Access product listing page
2. Verify menu icon is present and clickable
3. Check navigation options in menu
4. Test logout functionality		Navigation menu works correctly with all options functionalMedium
20TC_PL_019Verify Social Media Links in FooterNavigation1. Navigate to product listing page
2. Scroll to footer section
3. Click on social media icons
4. Verify links open in new tabs		Social media links open correctly in new browser tabsLow
21TC_PL_020Verify Product Count DisplayInformation1. Access product listing page
2. Count total number of products shown
3. Verify count matches expected inventory
4. Check if product count indicator exists		Correct number of products displayed matching inventoryLow
22TC_PL_021Verify Error Handling - Invalid ProductError Handling1. Navigate to product listing page
2. Attempt to access non-existent product URL
3. Verify appropriate error message
4. Check graceful error handling		Appropriate error message displayed for invalid product accessLow
23TC_PL_022Verify Back to Products NavigationNavigation1. Navigate from product listing to detail page
2. Use back button or navigation
3. Verify return to product listing
4. Check page state is maintained		Can navigate back to product listing page successfullyMedium
24TC_PL_023Verify Accessibility - Keyboard NavigationAccessibility1. Access product listing page
2. Use Tab key to navigate through elements
3. Verify all interactive elements are reachable
4. Check focus indicators are visible		All page elements accessible via keyboard navigationMedium
25TC_PL_024Verify Page Performance - Load TimePerformance1. Clear browser cache
2. Navigate to product listing page
3. Measure page load time
4. Verify loads within acceptable time (< 3 seconds)		Page loads within acceptable performance parametersLow
26TC_PL_025Verify Cross-Browser CompatibilityCompatibility1. Open product listing in different browsers
2. Test functionality in Chrome, Firefox, Safari
3. Verify consistent behavior
4. Check for browser-specific issues		Product listing functions consistently across different browsersMedium

Metadata

  • backend: excelize
  • sheet name: Product_Listing_Tests
  • read range: A1:F26

Notice

All ranges have been read.

2TC_PL_001Verify Product Listing Page LoadFunctional1. Navigate to https://www.saucedemo.com
2. Login with valid credentials
3. Verify page loads completely
4. Check for page title 'Swag Labs'		Product listing page loads successfully with all products displayed and page title shows 'Swag Labs'High
3TC_PL_002Verify Product Grid DisplayUI/Layout1. Login and navigate to inventory page
2. Verify products are displayed in grid format
3. Check each product has image, name, description, and price
4. Verify 'Add to cart' button is present for each product		All products displayed in proper grid layout with complete information and functional buttonsHigh
4TC_PL_003Verify Product Sorting - Name A to ZFunctional1. Access product listing page
2. Click on sorting dropdown
3. Select 'Name (A to Z)' option
4. Verify products are sorted alphabetically		Products are sorted in ascending alphabetical order by nameMedium
5TC_PL_004Verify Product Sorting - Name Z to AFunctional1. Access product listing page
2. Click on sorting dropdown
3. Select 'Name (Z to A)' option
4. Verify products are sorted reverse alphabetically		Products are sorted in descending alphabetical order by nameMedium
6TC_PL_005Verify Product Sorting - Price Low to HighFunctional1. Access product listing page
2. Click on sorting dropdown
3. Select 'Price (low to high)' option
4. Verify products are sorted by price ascending		Products are sorted by price from lowest to highestMedium
7TC_PL_006Verify Product Sorting - Price High to LowFunctional1. Access product listing page
2. Click on sorting dropdown
3. Select 'Price (high to low)' option
4. Verify products are sorted by price descending		Products are sorted by price from highest to lowestMedium
8TC_PL_007Verify Add to Cart FunctionalityFunctional1. Navigate to product listing page
2. Click 'Add to cart' button for any product
3. Verify button text changes to 'Remove'
4. Check cart badge shows item count		Product is added to cart, button text changes, and cart counter incrementsHigh
9TC_PL_008Verify Remove from Cart FunctionalityFunctional1. Add a product to cart first
2. Click 'Remove' button for the same product
3. Verify button text changes back to 'Add to cart'
4. Check cart badge decrements		Product is removed from cart, button text reverts, and cart counter decrementsHigh
10TC_PL_009Verify Product Image DisplayUI/Visual1. Access product listing page
2. Verify all product images are loaded
3. Check images are properly sized and aligned
4. Verify no broken image icons		All product images display correctly without any broken linksMedium
11TC_PL_010Verify Product Name LinksNavigation1. Navigate to product listing page
2. Click on any product name
3. Verify navigation to product detail page
4. Check product details match selected item		Clicking product name navigates to correct product detail pageMedium
12TC_PL_011Verify Product Image LinksNavigation1. Navigate to product listing page
2. Click on any product image
3. Verify navigation to product detail page
4. Check product details match selected item		Clicking product image navigates to correct product detail pageMedium
13TC_PL_012Verify Multiple Items Add to CartFunctional1. Navigate to product listing page
2. Add multiple different products to cart
3. Verify cart counter shows correct total
4. Check all items in cart		Multiple items can be added and cart counter reflects accurate countHigh
14TC_PL_013Verify Price Format DisplayUI/Data1. Access product listing page
2. Check price format for all products
3. Verify currency symbol ($) is displayed
4. Check decimal places are consistent		All prices display with proper currency formatting ($X.XX)Low
15TC_PL_014Verify Product Description TextContent1. Navigate to product listing page
2. Check product descriptions are visible
3. Verify descriptions are complete and readable
4. Check for any truncation or formatting issues		Product descriptions are clearly visible and properly formattedLow
16TC_PL_015Verify Page Responsiveness - Mobile ViewResponsive1. Open product listing page
2. Resize browser to mobile width (375px)
3. Verify layout adjusts properly
4. Check all elements remain accessible		Page layout adapts correctly to mobile screen sizeMedium
17TC_PL_016Verify Page Responsiveness - Tablet ViewResponsive1. Open product listing page
2. Resize browser to tablet width (768px)
3. Verify layout adjusts properly
4. Check grid arrangement changes appropriately		Page layout adapts correctly to tablet screen sizeMedium
18TC_PL_017Verify Shopping Cart Icon FunctionalityNavigation1. Navigate to product listing page
2. Click on shopping cart icon
3. Verify navigation to cart page
4. Check cart contents display correctly		Cart icon navigates to cart page showing current itemsMedium
19TC_PL_018Verify Menu/Navigation BarNavigation1. Access product listing page
2. Verify menu icon is present and clickable
3. Check navigation options in menu
4. Test logout functionality		Navigation menu works correctly with all options functionalMedium
20TC_PL_019Verify Social Media Links in FooterNavigation1. Navigate to product listing page
2. Scroll to footer section
3. Click on social media icons
4. Verify links open in new tabs		Social media links open correctly in new browser tabsLow
21TC_PL_020Verify Product Count DisplayInformation1. Access product listing page
2. Count total number of products shown
3. Verify count matches expected inventory
4. Check if product count indicator exists		Correct number of products displayed matching inventoryLow
22TC_PL_021Verify Error Handling - Invalid ProductError Handling1. Navigate to product listing page
2. Attempt to access non-existent product URL
3. Verify appropriate error message
4. Check graceful error handling		Appropriate error message displayed for invalid product accessLow
23TC_PL_022Verify Back to Products NavigationNavigation1. Navigate from product listing to detail page
2. Use back button or navigation
3. Verify return to product listing
4. Check page state is maintained		Can navigate back to product listing page successfullyMedium
24TC_PL_023Verify Accessibility - Keyboard NavigationAccessibility1. Access product listing page
2. Use Tab key to navigate through elements
3. Verify all interactive elements are reachable
4. Check focus indicators are visible		All page elements accessible via keyboard navigationMedium
25TC_PL_024Verify Page Performance - Load TimePerformance1. Clear browser cache
2. Navigate to product listing page
3. Measure page load time
4. Verify loads within acceptable time (< 3 seconds)		Page loads within acceptable performance parametersLow
26TC_PL_025Verify Cross-Browser CompatibilityCompatibility1. Open product listing in different browsers
2. Test functionality in Chrome, Firefox, Safari
3. Verify consistent behavior
4. Check for browser-specific issues		Product listing functions consistently across different browsersMedium

2TC_PL_001Verify Product Listing Page LoadFunctional1. Navigate to https://www.saucedemo.com
2. Login with valid credentials
3. Verify page loads completely
4. Check for page title 'Swag Labs'		Product listing page loads successfully with all products displayed and page title shows 'Swag Labs'High
3TC_PL_002Verify Product Grid DisplayUI/Layout1. Login and navigate to inventory page
2. Verify products are displayed in grid format
3. Check each product has image, name, description, and price
4. Verify 'Add to cart' button is present for each product		All products displayed in proper grid layout with complete information and functional buttonsHigh
4TC_PL_003Verify Product Sorting - Name A to ZFunctional1. Access product listing page
2. Click on sorting dropdown
3. Select 'Name (A to Z)' option
4. Verify products are sorted alphabetically		Products are sorted in ascending alphabetical order by nameMedium
5TC_PL_004Verify Product Sorting - Name Z to AFunctional1. Access product listing page
2. Click on sorting dropdown
3. Select 'Name (Z to A)' option
4. Verify products are sorted reverse alphabetically		Products are sorted in descending alphabetical order by nameMedium
6TC_PL_005Verify Product Sorting - Price Low to HighFunctional1. Access product listing page
2. Click on sorting dropdown
3. Select 'Price (low to high)' option
4. Verify products are sorted by price ascending		Products are sorted by price from lowest to highestMedium
7TC_PL_006Verify Product Sorting - Price High to LowFunctional1. Access product listing page
2. Click on sorting dropdown
3. Select 'Price (high to low)' option
4. Verify products are sorted by price descending		Products are sorted by price from highest to lowestMedium
8TC_PL_007Verify Add to Cart FunctionalityFunctional1. Navigate to product listing page
2. Click 'Add to cart' button for any product
3. Verify button text changes to 'Remove'
4. Check cart badge shows item count		Product is added to cart, button text changes, and cart counter incrementsHigh
9TC_PL_008Verify Remove from Cart FunctionalityFunctional1. Add a product to cart first
2. Click 'Remove' button for the same product
3. Verify button text changes back to 'Add to cart'
4. Check cart badge decrements		Product is removed from cart, button text reverts, and cart counter decrementsHigh
10TC_PL_009Verify Product Image DisplayUI/Visual1. Access product listing page
2. Verify all product images are loaded
3. Check images are properly sized and aligned
4. Verify no broken image icons		All product images display correctly without any broken linksMedium
11TC_PL_010Verify Product Name LinksNavigation1. Navigate to product listing page
2. Click on any product name
3. Verify navigation to product detail page
4. Check product details match selected item		Clicking product name navigates to correct product detail pageMedium
12TC_PL_011Verify Product Image LinksNavigation1. Navigate to product listing page
2. Click on any product image
3. Verify navigation to product detail page
4. Check product details match selected item		Clicking product image navigates to correct product detail pageMedium
13TC_PL_012Verify Multiple Items Add to CartFunctional1. Navigate to product listing page
2. Add multiple different products to cart
3. Verify cart counter shows correct total
4. Check all items in cart		Multiple items can be added and cart counter reflects accurate countHigh
14TC_PL_013Verify Price Format DisplayUI/Data1. Access product listing page
2. Check price format for all products
3. Verify currency symbol ($) is displayed
4. Check decimal places are consistent		All prices display with proper currency formatting ($X.XX)Low
15TC_PL_014Verify Product Description TextContent1. Navigate to product listing page
2. Check product descriptions are visible
3. Verify descriptions are complete and readable
4. Check for any truncation or formatting issues		Product descriptions are clearly visible and properly formattedLow
16TC_PL_015Verify Page Responsiveness - Mobile ViewResponsive1. Open product listing page
2. Resize browser to mobile width (375px)
3. Verify layout adjusts properly
4. Check all elements remain accessible		Page layout adapts correctly to mobile screen sizeMedium
17TC_PL_016Verify Page Responsiveness - Tablet ViewResponsive1. Open product listing page
2. Resize browser to tablet width (768px)
3. Verify layout adjusts properly
4. Check grid arrangement changes appropriately		Page layout adapts correctly to tablet screen sizeMedium
18TC_PL_017Verify Shopping Cart Icon FunctionalityNavigation1. Navigate to product listing page
2. Click on shopping cart icon
3. Verify navigation to cart page
4. Check cart contents display correctly		Cart icon navigates to cart page showing current itemsMedium
19TC_PL_018Verify Menu/Navigation BarNavigation1. Access product listing page
2. Verify menu icon is present and clickable
3. Check navigation options in menu
4. Test logout functionality		Navigation menu works correctly with all options functionalMedium
20TC_PL_019Verify Social Media Links in FooterNavigation1. Navigate to product listing page
2. Scroll to footer section
3. Click on social media icons
4. Verify links open in new tabs		Social media links open correctly in new browser tabsLow
21TC_PL_020Verify Product Count DisplayInformation1. Access product listing page
2. Count total number of products shown
3. Verify count matches expected inventory
4. Check if product count indicator exists		Correct number of products displayed matching inventoryLow
22TC_PL_021Verify Error Handling - Invalid ProductError Handling1. Navigate to product listing page
2. Attempt to access non-existent product URL
3. Verify appropriate error message
4. Check graceful error handling		Appropriate error message displayed for invalid product accessLow
23TC_PL_022Verify Back to Products NavigationNavigation1. Navigate from product listing to detail page
2. Use back button or navigation
3. Verify return to product listing
4. Check page state is maintained		Can navigate back to product listing page successfullyMedium
24TC_PL_023Verify Accessibility - Keyboard NavigationAccessibility1. Access product listing page
2. Use Tab key to navigate through elements
3. Verify all interactive elements are reachable
4. Check focus indicators are visible		All page elements accessible via keyboard navigationMedium
25TC_PL_024Verify Page Performance - Load TimePerformance1. Clear browser cache
2. Navigate to product listing page
3. Measure page load time
4. Verify loads within acceptable time (< 3 seconds)		Page loads within acceptable performance parametersLow
26TC_PL_025Verify Cross-Browser CompatibilityCompatibility1. Open product listing in different browsers
2. Test functionality in Chrome, Firefox, Safari
3. Verify consistent behavior
4. Check for browser-specific issues		Product listing functions consistently across different browsersMedium
